meanings.definition: A reddish variety of chalcedony used as a gemstone.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful cornelian pendant around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The ring sparkled with a deep red cornelian stone.
meanings.sent3: The cornelian gemstone seemed to glow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as bright as a polished cornelian gem.
meanings.sent5: The cornelian gemstone was as precious as a ruby.

meanings.definition: A deep red color resembling the gemstone cornelian.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed red and orange to create a vibrant cornelian hue.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in shades of cornelian and gold.
meanings.sent3: The cornelian color of the dress made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks turned a deep cornelian shade when he blushed.
meanings.sent5: The cornelian color of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
